title: Single Family Home with Detached Studio – Grote Berg, Curaçao
description: Located in the desirable residential area of Grote Berg, this move-in-ready single-family residence offers a refined balance of comfort and investment potential. Set on 715 m² of owned land, the home features bright living and dining areas with air-conditioning, a contemporary kitchen with quality finishes, and seamless indoor-outdoor living. A covered back porch overlooks the private swimming pool, while a detached studio offers flexible use as guest accommodation or rental income. This turnkey property presents an excellent opportunity in one of Curaçao’s most sought-after neighborhoods.
features: Two modern bathrooms including an en-suite
Bright living and dining areas with air-conditioning
Detached studio suitable for rental or guests
